idea-plugin.name: Eclipse Code Formatter
idea-plugin.description: Allows using Eclipse's code formatter directly from IntelliJ without slow executing Eclipse via command line. Also emulates Eclipse's imports optimizing - go to http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-code-formatter-intellij-plugin/wiki/HowTo for instructions how to configure it.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.5 (2011-11-26)
- imporved imports group joining

0.4 (2011-11-25)
- fixed bug with optimizing imports

0.3 (2011-11-24)
- new Eclipse like Optimizing Imports function
- notification about successfull formatting will come up only when formatted area is longer than 300 character.

0.2 (2011-11-17)
- fixed bug -when file was edited and editor was closed and then file was reformatted without prior saving, changes was lost.

0.1 (2011-11-01)
- Initial release


Note:
versions 0.x.0 is for IntelliJ 10.5
versions 0.x.1 is for IntelliJ 11.0

Known issues:
-when editor is opened, view sometimes moves one line up or down after reformatting
-IntelliJ's import optimizing must be manually turned off, otherwise this plugin will not optimize imports on reformatting
-ctrl-shift-o uses IntelliJ's import optimising no matter what
